main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, round object resembling a saucer that would intermittently move and remain stationary.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 5 to 7 minutes., The object appeared bright and silver and had a circular shape., The object turned on and off, appearing and disappearing four or five times., The observation was made from a height of about 70 degrees elevation., The witness was playing baseball at the time they noticed the object in the sky.
sighted object: a bright, round object resembling a saucer
witness description: a 12-year-old girl who described the object as bright and silver
